backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, admission form submissions, photo gallery, and news management with role-based access control (admin/user permissions) and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (home page, gallery, news, admission form, admin panel) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration files for the organization website application.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining warm traditional color palette (saffron, deep red, gold) using OKLCH color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Karani Sena Yuva Shakti website with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, admission form, and protected admin panel, plus ThemeProvider, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied component with shield icon and return-to-home button for unauthorized admin panel access attempts.
frontend/src/components/AdminCandidatesL: Admin component displaying admission applications in an accordion list with candidate photos, contact details, qualifications, and addresses.
frontend/src/components/AdminGalleryMana: Admin component for managing gallery photos with add/delete functionality, image upload, description input, and grid display of current gallery items with delete confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminNewsManager: Admin component for CRUD operations on news items, featuring a form for creating/editing posts with title and content fields, and a list view with edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Public-facing gallery section that displays photo grid with descriptions, handles loading states with skeletons, and shows empty state when no photos exist.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploadField: Reusable image upload component with drag-and-drop support, file validation (10MB limit), preview display, upload progress tracking, and ExternalBlob integration.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with responsive navigation, Internet Identity authentication, admin role detection, and mobile menu toggle functionality.
frontend/src/components/NewsSection.tsx: Public news section displaying sorted news items in a card grid, with loading skeletons and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without profiles to enter their name, blocking interaction until profile setup is complete.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: A React component that protects routes by checking if the user is authenticated and has admin privileges, showing a loader during checks and an access denied screen if unauthorized.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an actor instance for backend communication, handling authentication with Internet Identity and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddGalleryItem.ts: Custom hook that provides a mutation for adding gallery items with an image and description, invalidating the gallery items query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateNewsItem.ts: Custom hook that provides a mutation for creating news items with title, content, and timestamp, invalidating the news items query cache on success.
Custom hook that provides a mutation for deleting gallery items by description, invalidating the gallery items query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteNewsItem.ts: Custom hook that provides a mutation for deleting news items by title, invalidating the news items query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditNewsItem.ts: Custom hook that provides a mutation for editing news items with updated title, content, and timestamp, invalidating the news items query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllCandidates.t: Custom hook that fetches all admission form candidates from the backend, enabled only when the actor is ready and user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllNewsItems.ts: Custom hook that fetches all news items from the backend, enabled when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Custom hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile, with loading state management and retry disabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetGalleryItems.ts: Custom hook that fetches all gallery items from the backend, enabled when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Comprehensive React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: Custom hook that provides a mutation for saving the current user's profile, invalidating the user profile query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAdmissionFor: Custom hook that provides a mutation for submitting admission forms with candidate details and optional photo.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm traditional color palette (saffron, deep red, gold) for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for managing admission applications, photo gallery, and news updates.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionFormPage.tsx: Page component with a form for submitting admission applications including personal details and photo upload, showing a success screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component with hero section displaying organization logo/name, call-to-action buttons for admission and scrolling to news, and sections for gallery and news content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended animations (accordion, fade-in), warm shadow variants, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document defining the Karani Sena Yuva Shakti website architecture with Internet Identity authentication, admission forms, admin panel for managing submissions/gallery/news, and image requirements for logo and hero background.
